    </td>
    <td align="left"> 
Swap made easy<br>
Trade on any blockchains <br>with uniswap based router, 0x protocol and kwenta sdk. 
    </td> 
  </tr>
</table>

<h5>How to use it</h5>
<pre>
<code>
   from dxsp import DexSwap
    dex = DexSwap()
    #BUY 1% to SWAP with BITCOIN
    #demo_tx = await dex.submit_order({
        "action": "BUY",
        "instrument": "BTC",
        "quantity": 1,
    })
</code>
</pre>
